body: :( i'm going to inform my mother that this buffoon on the internet is calling me retarded on  a porn website for a doujinshi he had waited 5 months to get translated because i had said a joke

@AllHopeLost She's scouting to find a good place to dock the ship, its obvious but the ship must be not moving, waiting her to come back. The reason she had sex with the kid was to teach him a lesson to not mess with pirates, and not to get money from him. Your reading comprehension must be as retarded as the way you talk.
HOLY SHIT, finally this is translated, i have been waiting for this for more than 5 months... never give up on your hopes and dreams.
who is navigating since shes not with the crew? And she didnt take any money from the guy L story L plot L author L art L most popular page
